resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81808</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81808</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>1009</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Homonyms</string>
            <string language="es">Homónimos</string>
            <string language="ga">Comhainmneacha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Homonyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Homonymes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Homonyms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Omonimi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομώνυμα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This quiz explores the use of various homonyms i.e. words that sound the same but have different meanings and have different spellings.</string>
            <string language="es">Este cuestionario estudia el uso de varios homónimos, p. ej. palabras que suenan igual pero tienen diferentes significados y se deletrean de otro modo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Fiosraíonn an tráth na gceist seo úsáid comhainmneacha éagsúla i.e. focail a bhfuil an fhuaim chéanna acu ach a bhfuil míniú agus litriú difriúil acu.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Quiz erforscht den Gebrauch von 
verschiedenen Homonymd.h. Wörtern, die klingen, dasselbe aber 
unterschiedliche Bedeutungen haben und unterschiedliche 
Rechtschreibungen haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce jeu explore l'utilisation des divers mots 
d'homonymes c.-à-d. qui retentissent la même chose mais ont 
différentes significations et ont différentes épellations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este quiz explora o uso das várias palavras dos 
homonyms isto é que soam o mesmo mas têm meanings diferentes e têm 
soletrações diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo quiz esplora l'uso di varie parole degli 
omonimi cioè che suonano lo stesso ma hanno significati differenti ed
hanno ortografie differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο διαγωνισμός γνώσεων ερευνά τη χρήση των 
διάφορων ομωνύμων δηλ. λέξεις που ηχούν το ίδιο πράγμα αλλά 
έχουν τις διαφορετικές έννοιες και έχουν τις διαφορετικές 
ορθογραφίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
